## G. SHAREHOLDING OF PROMOTER/PROMOTER GROUP AND ADDITIONAL TOP 10 PUBLIC SHAREHOLDERS OF THE COMPANY AS AT ALLOTMENT:

Our Promoter and Promoter Group and Top 10 Public Shareholders collectively hold 1,37,39,724 Equity shares of our Company aggregating to 97.54% of the pre-issue paid-up Share Capital of our Company.
